name: Steal My Heart
description:
Just two days before the Valentine's day, there has been a gruesome murder in the town square. The detective got a note near the dead body. It is a horrific poem.

"You are the heart that I am missing! ... You are the part that I am missing! ..."

Is it a deranged lover or a psychopath? 

In the meantime, the Detective falls in love with one of the suspect! Is he going to face horrors on this valentine?

** UPDATE - Known Issues  during GameJam **

- There was a crash happening when you launch the tutorial and move ahead with that. It was a major showstopper. Fixed it.

- There is one minor bug. When you launch the game and find the 'In-game Compass' to be too huge, you can change it from the options. I have set the size to 40%, But sometimes by default it resets it to 100%, you can reduce it to at least 50% from the options menu .
